tweet_text: For these reasons, any spending deal must include funding for border security.  I applaud President Trump and his commitment to securing our borders and standing firm until it is done.  #SecureOurBorder

name: David Rouzer
tweet_text: Just in North Carolina, the heroin and fentanyl being smuggled across the border are taking the lives of our family members, friends, and neighbors.  This is all part of the crisis. #SecureOurBorder

name: David Rouzer
tweet_text: During the course of the past few years, our nation has experienced an influx of very dangerous individuals with criminal records and many on the terrorist watch list, an increase in human trafficking, and a lethal spike in drug trafficking.  This affects us all. #SecureOurBorder
